23-0739.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Regular Meeting held Tuesday, June 13, 2023.Page 1 of 3411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, JULY 11, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Supernaw, seconded by Commissioner Kerr, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 6 - Duggan, Supernaw, Kerr, Saro, Taranto and AllenAbsent: 4 - Zendejas, Uranga, Austin and Ricks-OddieCouncilwoman Zendejas joined the meeting.2.

23-0740.summary: Recommendation to receive and file the Housing Authority Financial and Operational Performance Reports for April 2023.  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Kerr, seconded by Commissioner Supernaw, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Zendejas, Duggan, Supernaw, Kerr, Saro, Taranto and AllenAbsent: 3 - Uranga, Austin and Ricks-Oddie3.

23-0741.summary: Recommendation to adopt resolution for a comprehensive update to the Housing Authority Administrative Plan for the Section 8 Housing Choice Voucher Program, to incorporate all new Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) regulations and multiple local policy changes.  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Kerr, seconded by Commissioner Saro, to approve recommendation and adopt Resolution No. H.A. 02-23.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Zendejas, Duggan, Supernaw, Kerr, Saro, Taranto and AllenAbsent: 3 - Uranga, Austin and Ricks-OddieEnactment No: H.A. 02-23Page 2 of 3411 W. OCEAN BOULEVARDCIVIC CHAMBERS, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, JULY 11, 2023CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTES4.

23-0742.summary: Recommendation to adopt resolution approving the Annual Plan for Fiscal Year 2022-2023 (Annual Plan) and authorizing Deputy Executive Director to transmit the Annual Plan to the Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD).  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Saro, seconded by Commissioner Kerr, to approve recommendation and adopt Resolution No. H.A. 03-23.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 7 - Zendejas, Duggan, Supernaw, Kerr, Saro, Taranto and AllenAbsent: 3 - Uranga, Austin and Ricks-OddieEnactment No: H.A. 03-235.
